data.ProductDescription: This account is available as a sole account to new and existing customers aged 18 years and over who are a full time third-level university or college student or a student nurse. Students on full time vocational courses at regional colleges may also apply.

Eligibility.Description: Available to full-time third-level university / college students or student nurses.

FeeSubDetails.FeesAndChargesNotes: 2.75% currency conversion on Stg amount- no automated transaction fee
£25.00 International or Stg payments, £15.00 for Stg payments to  AIB RoI beneficiaries, £10.00 for Euro payments to AIB RoI beneficiaries
No charge if withing AIB Group
£6.00 each > £100, £2.00 each < or = £100, £5.00 each-SEPA, From AIB Group-No charge
£25.00 International or Stg payments, £15.00 for Stg payments to  AIB RoI beneficiaries, £10.00 for Euro payments to AIB RoI beneficiaries

data.ProductDescription: Customers who have graduated from a full time third level course within the last two years. A customer can only hold a graduate account for one period of three years.

Eligibility.Description: Customers must be aged 18+ to open the account. A customer must have graduated within the last two years. A customer can only hold a graduate account for one period of three years. Sole accounts only.

FeeSubDetails.FeesAndChargesNotes: 2.75% currency conversion on Stg amount- no automated transaction fee

data.ProductDescription: This current account is for students between the ages of 12 and 18 who are in part time or full time second level education.

Eligibility.Description: Students aged 12 to 18 with a minimum opening balance of £10 required. Sole accounts only

data.ProductDescription: This account is for people aged 18 and over who need the full services offered by a current account.

Eligibility.Description: Only Personal Customers who are aged 18+ can open the account.

data.ProductDescription: Personal customers who require a current account with opportunity of free daily banking whether in credit or debit and to earn credit interest

Eligibility.Description: Personal customers only, aged 18+. Customers must be able to meet the minimum monthly lodgement of £1,200.

FeeSubDetails.FeesAndChargesNotes: £7 if carried out at branch counter, £25 via CHAPS and no charge if via Online / Phoneline Banking
£7 if carried out at branch counter, £25 via CHAPS and no charge if via Online / Phoneline Banking

Charged if account is in debit during the month. You will not pay this fee if you carry out the following transactions - a. Two purchases using your Visa debit car. / b. Two debit transactions using either the Online or Phoneline Banking servicers, or both / c. One purchase using your Visa debit card and one debit transaction using either the Online or Phoneline Banking Services

data.ProductDescription: High net worth customers who have business banking relationships but want to open and operate a personal account separately.

Eligibility.Description: Personal customers aged 18+ only. Customer must also have Business Banking accounts with us and must register for our Online Services.
